content:
ber 21, 2016
												A nice reflex testing game; wouldn't recomend it as paid game, so good call from the developer. Runs smooth and physics are fine.Only issue I have is later levels that increase the number Chicken shelves (Hmm, can't think of another way to describe that), places them further away where I'm hitting the wall. That's within a 2M SQ play area. That's not a moan but really some dev feedback too look into.

content:
r 9, 2016
												A pretty cheeky little game where you have to get a bunch of eggs into a container. Sounds pretty stupid at first but it's pretty fun especially with the special eggs and abilities. One bad thing though was that in the second level I couldn't get to the container as it was beyond my playspace, but the first level was pretty good.Overall I have to give this 6 barns out of 9, would recommend to HowToBasic again :^)

10
												Good fun to play, and hysterical to watch others play too!A great game to have a laugh with your friends and family.Good - Small download - Runs quickly and very smoothly (GTX1080 and I7-6700K). - A good one to play more than once.Hmmm - Can't seem to view the high scores? Play area just says 'Nick' and 'Score' with no scores.
